fields.label: Key
fields.tooltip: The key of the item which generated a warning.

fields.label: Message
fields.tooltip: The message describing the warning that occurred while processing the item.

fields.label: Name
fields.tooltip: The name of the source at which the warning originated (e.g., a particular skill).

fields.label: Details
fields.tooltip: Additional, verbose details about the warning to assist in debugging the indexer.

fields.label: Documentation Link
fields.tooltip: A link to a troubleshooting guide for these classes of warnings.
